mapper.select: SELECT rh.receive_no, rh.asn_bill_no, rh.bill_state, rh.wh_code, owner.owner_code, owner.owner_name, rh.bill_type_cd, wbt.bill_type_name, rh.in_store_type, rh.asn_bill_no, rh.supplier_code, rh.supplier_name, rh.supplier_contact, rh.udf1, rh.remark from receive_header rh left join wms_bill_type wbt on rh.bill_type_cd = wbt.bill_type_cd left join wms_owner owner on rh.wo_id = owner.wo_id where receive_id = #{id} AND rh.is_deleted = 0

select h.receive_id, h.receive_no, h.supplier_name, b.bill_type_name, h.udf1 from receive_header h LEFT JOIN wms_bill_type b ON h.bill_type_cd = b.bill_type_cd LEFT JOIN receive_detail d on h.receive_id= d.receive_id
h.receive_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.no},'%') AND h.is_deleted=0 AND h.wh_id=#{query.whId} and d.surplus_qty>0 OR h.external_order_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.no},'%') AND h.wh_id=#{query.whId} AND h.is_deleted=0 and d.surplus_qty>0
group by h.receive_id,b.bill_type_name order by h.create_time
select receive_id, receive_no, external_order_no, wh_code from receive_header where receive_id = #{receiveId}

SELECT h.receive_no, h.bill_state, h.remark, `user1`.real_name as create_user, h.create_time, `user2`.real_name as update_user, h.update_time FROM receive_header h LEFT JOIN blade_user `user1` ON h.create_user = `user1`.id LEFT JOIN blade_user `user2` ON h.update_user = `user2`.id WHERE asn_bill_id = #{asnBillId}
ORDER BY h.create_time DESC
